headline.main: ITALIANS CLAIM LIBYAN SUCCESS; They Report Recapture of Sidi Omar, Which British Deny Having Taken

lead_paragraph: ROME, Nov. 27 -- The Italian High Command today announced the retaking of Sidi Omar in the Battle of Libya. This operation, it indicated, was made possible by the Savona Division, which "smashed attacks of enemy tanks," thus facilitating the task of Italo-German armored units south of Solum.
abstract: claim Axis counter-attacks caused heavy Brit tank losses in central Libyan sector
